nodes.text: Shaneo was a male Human who worked as a crafting equipment merchant on the planet Corellia. During the Great Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic he ran a stall within the Republic controlled Shipwright Auxiliary Spaceport. Shaneo had brown hair and eyes and tanned skin. While at his stall he wore white and grey clothing.

Shaneo first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic which was released in 2011 by BioWare. In the game he serves as a Republic crew skills vendor on Corellia. His location is marked in the Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, but his name is given as "Shane Rylo".
